title: I have My Pessat Exam tomorrow ie on 2 may 1 shift
content: Guys can u give any tips to get good marks as my aim btech with cse what is the average marks so i can get belong to the rank

comments.body:
if u attempt less than 80 do full guess work 

if more than or equal to 80 then no tukka 

if more than equal to 110 u can do guess work again 

btw.. ur mains percentile??
88 in jee mains
bss bhai follow the above u will be good acc to me. and plzz tell ur exam experience after the exam
tera kab hai
mera hogaya bhai isliye to bta rha hu 22 apr ko tha
What kind of big brain math is this
unable to open this
bro its not good case u just taking on tukkkas
80 questions or 80 marks?

Lootenge tumhe par firbhi, 
Exam ka koi pattern nahi hoga, dekhkar gabhraana mat aur social media me kam time spend karo.
Basically, kcet ya comedk ki tarah hai.
ok thanks
dekh bhai i attempted 93 so i have done any tukka but if u have less than 80 why not bet on ur luck
Have you got any mail regarding interview booking
no why?? have u got any
intreview is for bsc course i think
My friend got one. He applied for btech :")
on which date he had his pessat??
23rd
ok mine was on 22nd but i havent got any. there website has also not given this kind of interview booking info.
Yeah thought so. I want to attach the screenshot but im not able to. My friend got the message from whats app actually
